image.caption: Feature Demo: Image Captions

Captions in Minimalist's Flash Header have a whole range of impressive features and options that you can change and customize. These options include 25 text animation types, 6 caption positions, caption size, color, opacity, font size, font color, alignment and much more. This demo will walk you through all the Caption features.
You can specify the Font size and Font color (HEX color values) for each caption. Unlike the Caption earlier, this one uses color #2E69FF and font size of 24pt.

Similarly, the box that contains the caption is also customizable. You can set the caption box color (HEX color values), size (percentage value), and opacity (percentage value). It can be made invisible if the opacity is set to 0. Unlike the previous slide, this one uses a box color #000000, size is set to 75% and the opacity is 30%.

There are six very useful caption positions. Depending on the image you are using, the caption text can be placed at a different position. The six positions are; Left, Right, Center, Top, Middle and Bottom. The next six slides will give you a preview of how the various caption positions look like.

25 GREAT TEXT ANIMATIONS -- 25 creative text animations are included with Minimalist's Flash Header. These include both flashy and subtle animations that are perfect for just about any project. The next 25 slides will give you a preview of these 25 caption animations.

You can easily set default settings for all captions in your flash header XML file, or you may define these settings for each image, whenever there are no settings defined the default settings are used. This helps keep things tidy, particularly when you wish to use the same settings for all image captions.
